column4: how to convert .doc files to postcript?
how to convert .doc files to postcript?
i need to use the file with efax
i need to fax microsoft documents , but first i have to convert them to postscript
open them in openoffice, that will convert to pdf, or you can use the print dialog to output as plain old postscript
i can convert them to pdf in openoffice, but i need them in .ps format
before i can fax them with efax
as i said, the print dialog can 'print' to a file, thats just plain postscript
that worked great, thanks, i did a test fax just to make sure
